channel.description: CC 410 - Week 8 This Week 3/22 - Design Patterns 3/22 - Test Doubles 3/22 - Patterns & Mocks Example 3/22 - Restaurant Milestone 6 Conference - Limited Availability Milestone 6 Orders & Combos Design Patterns Factory Method, Builder, Singleton, Iterator Unit Tests with Doubles Few GUI Changes Testing Issues Limited Memory (512 MB) Java: gradle --stop Project -> Restart Box Refresh Browser Python: run tests in batches Looking Ahead Module 9 - External Libraries Module 10 - Releases Week 9 & 10 Combined Final Project 3 Web APIs, etc.
